properties.title: Market Hall Altenrhein
properties.abstract: Visit the Market Hall Altenrhein which was built following the ideas and concepts of Friendensreich Hundertwasser.
properties.description: Gilded onion spires, illuminating colours, rolling lines, unlike windows, uneven floors, colourful ceramic pillars, shaded walkways and greening roof surfaces are the characteristics of the Market Hall, designed following the ideas and concepts of Friedensreich Hundertwasser.
properties.name: Markthalle Altenrhein
